headline: Technological Cooperation in Support of Afghan Cultural Heritage

teaser.content:
The German Archaeological Institute provides technological support and knowledge transfer for the creation of a digital heritage management platform in Afghanistan.

The President of the German Archaeological Institute (DAI), Friederike Fless, and the Acting Director of the Directorate for Preservation of Historic Cities at the Afghan Ministry of Urban Development and Land (MUDL), Reza Sharifi, signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) on the premises of the DAI's Berlin head offices, in August 2019.
